laboratory_examinations.findings: CSF was sterile and acellular. Protein was 358 mg/L, glucose 2.9 mmol/L (plasma 4.8 mmol/L); oligoclonal bands were absent.
Mild diffuse axonal degeneration of myelinated and unmyelinated fibers; no inflammation or amyloid.
Macrocytic anemia (MCV 102 fl, hemoglobin 11.4 g/dL), lymphopenia (1.3 x 10^9/L), white cell count (4.9 x 10^9/L) and platelet count (239 x 10^9/L) within normal limits.
Serum vitamin B12 was 1,500 ng/L; normal plasma homocysteine and absent urine methylmalonic acid.
Serum copper was 2 µmol/L (normal range 11 to 20 µmol/L), ceruloplasmin was 0.04 mg/L (normal range 0.2 to 0.6 mg/L).
laboratory_examinations.changes_over_time: Copper deficiency was confirmed; serum levels normalized after treatment.

laboratory_examinations.findings: Serum zinc was 7.4 µmol/L (normal range 11 to 24 µmol/L).
Twenty-four-hour urinary copper was 1.11 µmol/24h (normal range 0 to 0.9 µmol/24h).
